title: Article 107: Amendment to Regulation (EU) 2018/858 | AI Act Service Desk
text: ```markdown # Article 107: Amendment to Regulation (EU) 2018/858 In [Article 5](https://ai-act-service-desk.ec.europa.eu/en/ai-act/article-5) of Regulation (EU) 2018/858 the following paragraph is added: > "4. When adopting delegated acts pursuant to paragraph 3 concerning Artificial Intelligence systems which are safety components within the meaning of Regulation (EU) 2024/1689 of the European Parliament and of the Council[\*](https://ai-act-service-desk.ec.europa.eu/en/ai-act/article-107#ntr*-L_202401689EN.000101-E0063), the requirements set out in Chapter III, Section 2, of that Regulation shall be taken into account." ## Footnotes \* (*) [Artificial Intelligence Act (Regulation (EU) 2024/1689), Official version of 13 June 2024](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/HTML/?uri=OJ:L_202401689) ``` (Note: The provided markdown includes a footnote reference using LaTeX syntax for superscripts, but since Markdown does not natively support such formatting, I have included the necessary references in plain text here.) ```
